sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Empowering Public Participation Act.

sections.heading: Penalty. A violation of subsection (a) of Section 10 is a Class C misdemeanor.
sections.text: Penalty. A violation of subsection (a) of Section 10 is a Class C misdemeanor.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
